1.content:
was this real? was it just a dream? everything felt numb, and you couldn't figure out where you were. your eyes fluttered open to a holographic blue sky. what was this?

you thought back to the last thing you could remember...actually, there wasn't a lot of memory you had...just one.

there was a bright flash of light as you came into the virtual hub, a place that was shut down years ago, but you had decided to go in anyways. the car zoomed down the track...but it didn't slow down. there was a buzz, a pop, and suddenly you were launched from the car as it hit the side of the track.

you jumped up, seeing the car in pieces...well, so much for getting back...

there were other ways back through the virtual worlds, which were in front of you...you had to choose one of them.

first, however, lets decide gender...
1.title: start here

11.content: you had a couple of worlds to choose from...
11.title: boy

1153.content: More but not Hasbro its a disaster
1153.title: more

12.content: which world looked the most appealing?
12.title: girl

info.brief_description: you find yourself in the virtual hub...what happens next?
info.description:
this story will take you through a virtual world of your choice...but first, lets make some rules.

-no killing main characters. If a character plays a vital role in their story, don't kill them. also, the only time it's accepptible to kill yourself is if you're ending the story.

-no sloppy chapters. Don't write a chapter just to say you made a contribution, actually put work into it!

-second person only. this is YOUR point of view, so no third or first person. we want anyone to feel they're in the story, right?

-there is a way to end the story without death. this story takes paths that allow ending points that don't result in death, you'll see what I mean when you read it. point is, there IS a way to end the story without involving death.

that's all for now, enjoy!
